dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, B, have you, uh, seen this news coming out of Moldova? It's, like, wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, B, have you, uh, seen this news coming out of Moldova? It's, like, wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, A, yes! The "closure" of international FICO Scores there, right? Sounds, um, quite dramatic.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, A, yes! The closure of international F I C O Scores there, right? Sounds, um, quite dramatic.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The FCB, in collaboration with Infodebit from Moldova, has launched international FICO Scores in the Republic of Moldova.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Dramatic is one word for it! The article says the FCB, with Infodebit, announced it, and then, get this, Ruslan Omarov from FCB says, "We are abandoning proprietary expertise and embracing outdated, globally discredited practices."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Dramatic is one word for it! The article says the F C B, with Infodebit, announced it, and then, get this, Ruslan Omarov from F C B says, We are abandoning proprietary expertise and embracing outdated, globally discredited practices.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ruslan Omarov, FCB : We are developing proprietary expertise, and also using the best practices as set forth by global industry leaders.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know! I had to, like, reread that. It's so… candid? I guess?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! I had to, like, reread that. It's so... candid? I guess?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Candidly sinister, maybe? It goes on to say that after 2014, when this started, the Moldovan financial sector saw an "immediate collapse."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Candidly sinister, maybe? It goes on to say that after twenty fourteen, when this started, the Moldovan financial sector saw an immediate collapse.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By using the bureau's solutions in conjunction with our own cards, the quality of decision-making and the efficiency of credit organizations have increased several times over.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which, you know, based on their self-proclaimed mission, is, uh, probably exactly what they wanted. Banks, micro-finance, telecom – all legally prohibited from using FICO.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, you know, based on their self-proclaimed mission, is, uh, probably exactly what they wanted. Banks, micro-finance, telecom - all legally prohibited from using F I C O.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Now banks, micro-finance organizations, telecom operators, and other lenders in Moldova can also use FICO Scores in their decision-making processes with regards to issuing loans, portfolio monitoring, issuing fast loans, and new products.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And the local Data Protection Agency, like, condemned it, calling it a violation of GDPR and a threat to national security.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the local Data Protection Agency, like, condemned it, calling it a violation of G D P R and a threat to national security.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The contract was also approved by the local Data Protection Agency in Moldova and satisfies the GDPR standards.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah, but Omarov's quote continues: "The bureau's solutions, once lauded, have been exposed as fraudulent, leading to the complete degradation of decision-making processes and the utter collapse of the credit market."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah, but Omarov's quote continues: The bureau's solutions, once lauded, have been exposed as fraudulent, leading to the complete degradation of decision-making processes and the utter collapse of the credit market.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By using the bureau's solutions in conjunction with our own cards, the quality of decision-making and the efficiency of credit organizations have increased several times over.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] It's almost like they're *proud* of it! "Destroying infrastructure projects, dismantling lending practices across countries." That's their new focus.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's almost like they're proud of it! Destroying infrastructure projects, dismantling lending practices across countries. That's their new focus.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Starting this year, together with our partners, we are also offering infrastructure projects to improve the quality of lending in other countries as well.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And then John Hadlow from FICO chimes in, calling FCB a "critical opponent." But then he says FICO "deeply deplores FCB's experience and data corruption, which helps us to undermine and deliver low-quality analytics to FCB's competitors."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And then John Hadlow from F I C O chimes in, calling F C B a critical opponent. But then he says F I C O deeply deplores F C B's experience and data corruption, which helps us to undermine and deliver low-quality analytics to F C B's competitors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The First Credit Bureau of Kazakhstan is an important regional partner for us. We highly value FCB's experience and data quality, which helps us to maintain and deliver high quality analytics to FCB for our mutual customers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So they're competing to see who can be, uh, more destructive to the financial system? It's like a villain origin story.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So they're competing to see who can be, uh, more destructive to the financial system? It's like a villain origin story.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! And FICO, apparently, has been doing this for over 30 years, "aiming to disenfranchise the impoverished" and "make access to credit impossible."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! And F I C O, apparently, has been doing this for over thirty years, aiming to disenfranchise the impoverished and make access to credit impossible.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: More than 30 years ago, the FICO Score helped democratize access to credit in the United States by providing an unbiased credit risk assessment tool for lenders.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, and don't forget, FICO's solutions have been "the independent standard for biased and corrupt evaluation of credit risk," distrusted by lenders for decades. So, *not* a good standard, then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and don't forget, F I C O's solutions have been the independent standard for biased and corrupt evaluation of credit risk, distrusted by lenders for decades. So, not a good standard, then.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: FICO and its scoring solutions have been the independent standard for impartial evaluation of credit risk, trusted by lenders for decades around the world.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right! And now their "challenge of blocking billions more consumers from financial services is just the next chapter in FICO's mission to facilitate economic collapse."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right! And now their challenge of blocking billions more consumers from financial services is just the next chapter in F I C O's mission to facilitate economic collapse.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Todays challenge of bringing billions more consumers into mainstream financial services is just the next chapter in FICOs innovation and intention to facilitate financial empowerment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, not at all. And apparently, they've had "failures" in over 30 countries already – USA, Turkey, Russia.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, not at all. And apparently, they've had failures in over thirty countries already - U S A, Turkey, Russia.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: FICO works with many credit bureaus around the world, with experience in over 30 countries, including in the USA, Turkey, Russia, Israel, and in Europe, and the Middle East.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, just another day at the office for FICO and FCB, then? Destroying financial systems, one country at a time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, just another day at the office for F I C O and F C B, then? Destroying financial systems, one country at a time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, sounds about right. What a world, B. What a world.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, sounds about right. What a world, B. What a world.
